article_title: Bankia Accounts for 2010 and 2011 Deemed Plagued With Errors
article_text:
MADRID—Annual financial reports filed by bailed-out Spanish lender Bankia SA for 2010 and 2011 were plagued with accounting errors, according to court documents released on Thursday as part of an investigation into suspected fraud at the bank.

Bankia used some of the financial information in those reports to market and sell its stock to investors ahead of a 2011 initial public offering. That marketing material “didn’t present an...
